scripts.run:pot: rm -rf dist; wp-pot --src '**/*.php' --dest-file languages/hotelier-wpml.pot --domain hotelier-wpml --package 'WP Hotelier Multilingual' --bug-report https://wphotelier.com --team 'WP Hotelier <support@wphotelier.com>'
scripts.zip: rsync -azP -e --delete --exclude='package.json' --exclude='.*/' --exclude='.*' --exclude='node_modules/' --exclude='dist/' . dist/hotelier-wpml; cd dist; zip -r hotelier-wpml.$npm_package_version.zip hotelier-wpml; cd ..
scripts.build-sync: npm run dirs -s; npm-run-all --silent --parallel build:* sync
scripts.dist: rm -rf dist; mkdir -p dist/hotelier-wpml; npm run zip -s
